title: Out of nowhere,my pixel freezed then kept restarting.Tried safemode,sideload OTA&flash-all,no succes
content:
Hello, out of no where, my pixel freezed then kept restarting. From there I ve made the following with no positive result
1-closed the phone and kept it in charging overnight, in the morning it kept restarting 
2-tried safemode, kept restarting
3-made a factory reset from the phone, still not solved
4-made a sideload OTA, first trial the mobile froze in the middle hower it opened normally, 5mins later it entered the restarting loop. 2nd trial finished till the end, however did not solve the problem
5- executed a flash-all, first trial did not complete, 2nd trial completed however the problem is not solved yet.

I don't know what else I could do, to my knowledge there is no authorized Google service provider in Egypt

Would love if anyone could point me to a solution. 

Thanks.
